title: veNNai tiruDi
sahitya:
veNNai tiruDi uNDa vENugOpAlanen eNNam kavar kaLvan


anupallavi

  kaNNan shen tAmaraik-kaNNan nIlamaNi vaNNan mughil vaNNan mAyavan vAsudEvan


caraNam    amudUTrum kuzhal koNDE Atram karai vandAn kumuda vAi malarviNDE kUviyarugaNaindE 
anru pirindanan andO innum kANEn shenraden uLLamum shei vaghai ariyEnE
